Title: Pan American Energy to target Asia, Brazil for LNG cargoes, looks for additional partners
Description: Argentina’s Pan American Energy will target the Brazilian and Asian markets with LNG cargoes from its floating LNG plant slated to begin operations in 2027 and expects to compete with the US in the Atlantic Basin due to its location.
Author: JS

Title: Excelerate Energy, PetroVietnam sign deal to study FSRU deployment for imports to Vietnam
Description: US-based floating LNG solution player Excelerate Energy and PetroVietnam Technical Services Corporation have signed a strategic partnership deal to jointly study floating storage regasification unit-based technical solutions for LNG imports into Vietnam.
Author: JS

Title: More flexibility in long-term LNG deals 'desirable': Pakistan LNG
Description: State-owned Pakistan LNG (PLL) said that it would prefer more flexibility in its long-term LNG offtake contracts due to uneven demand throughout the year.
Author: JS

Title: TotalEnergies inks 7-year LNG deal with Hyundai Chemical for 0.2 mtpa
Description: TotalEnergies has signed a heads of agreement to supply 0.2 mtpa of LNG annually to HD Hyundai Chemical for a period of seven years, starting in 2027.
Author: JS

Title: Energos Princess returns to Altamira FLNG; first full loading eyed
Description: The 138,000 m3 Energos Princess LNG tanker has returned to New Fortress Energy’s 1.4 mtpa Altamira Fast LNG terminal in Mexico possibly to ship the terminal’s first full LNG cargo after lifting its first partial cargo on Aug. 10.
Author: CK
